mapper.insert: insert into t_order_management ( goods_id, order_price, goods_count, store_id, order_status ) values ( #{goodsCode}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsCount}, #{storeCode}, 1 )
insert into t_goods_evaluate ( order_id, goods_id, evaluate, evaluate_score ) values ( #{orderCode}, #{goodsCode}, #{evaluate}, #{evaluateScore} )
mapper.update: update t_order_management set order_status = #{orderState}, version = version + 1, last_modified_by=now() where order_id = #{orderCode}
mapper.select: select a.store_name, a.address, b.order_price, b.goods_count, b.order_id, b.gmt_create, b.order_status, c.goods_name, c.goods_sell_price as Price, c.goods_code as Code, c.goods_introduction as introduction, b.goods_count from t_store_information a,t_order_management b,t_goods_management c where c.store_code = a.store_id and c.goods_code = b.goods_id and b.order_id =#{orderCode}

select a.store_name, a.address, b.order_price, b.goods_count, b.order_id, b.gmt_create, b.order_status orderState, c.goods_name, c.goods_sell_price as Price, c.goods_code as Code, b.goods_count from t_store_information a,t_order_management b,t_goods_management c where c.store_code = a.store_id and c.goods_code = b.goods_id
and b.order_status like concat('%', #{orderState}, '%')
select goods_code, goods_picture from t_goods_evaluate a,t_goods_management b where a.goods_id = b.goods_code and a.order_id = #{orderCode}
mapper.update: update t_app_shop set is_deleted = 1, gmt_modified = now() where shop_id = #{shopCode}
